snippet: Mor Spirit won the $150,000 Robert B. Lewis Stakes by one and a half lengths at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., reinforcing his status as the top 3-year-old in the barn of the Triple Crown-winning trainer Bob Baffert.
lead_paragraph: Mor Spirit won the $150,000 Robert B. Lewis Stakes by one and a half lengths at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif., reinforcing his status as the top 3-year-old in the barn of the Triple Crown-winning trainer Bob Baffert.

headline.main: A Victory for a Baffert Horse
headline.print_headline: A Victory for a Baffert Horse
